## What {.suso}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}
TODO: video of toggling between different workspaces that show different questionnaires, different interviews, different data

::: {.column width="30%"}

- Split server into (mostly) isolated divisions
- Segregate own objects (e.g., questionnaires, interviews, assignments, etc.)
- Restrict user access by workspace (i.e., whitelist users)
- Allow only admin access to all workspaces
- See more [here](https://docs.mysurvey.solutions/headquarters/accounts/workspaces/)

:::

## How {.suso}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}

![](assets/create_workspace.mp4){fig-align="center"}

:::

::: {.column width="30%"}
- Log in as admin
- Click on `r fontawesome::fa(name = "gear")` icon 
- Click on `Workspaces` tab
- Click on the `NEW` button
- Provide parameters (i.e., name and display name)
- Press name
:::
